body:
Environment
Dubbo version: 2.5.9
Operating System version: linux
Java version: 1.8
registry:zookeeper
2.7.7的源码已经改了，TheadLess。你看下源码
Is curator4.0.1 incompatible zookeeper-3.5.5?

`org.apache.dubbo.rpc.service.GenericService.$invokeAsync()` is confusing, whether it is asynchronous call on the consumer side or asynchronous execution on the provider side ?

I think it is more reasonable to call asynchronously on the consumer side. In this case, the provider side should not be called the $invokeAsync method.

源码有问题，bug在org.apache.dubbo.config.spring.beans.factory.annotation.ServiceAnnotationBeanPostProcessor#postProcessBeanDefinitionRegistry  与org.apache.dubbo.config.spring.context.annotation.DubboComponentScanRegistrar  都会注册BeanDefinition

重新编译解决
删除dubbo-config-api | pom.xml文件中dubbo-rpc-dubbo和dubbo-rpc-rest依赖的test作用域。
dubbo-future-timeout-thread 内存占用过高。频繁GC

@entropyfeng 

Open the Maven project on the right side of IDEA, find dubbo-serialization-protobuf item, expand the plugin list, find the protobuf item, execute protobuf:compile, and finally refresh the maven project, you will find that no error will be reported.
终于,有人发现跟我一样的问题了,不过我没有找到具体的解决方案,非常感谢
遇到同样问题, 1年多了还没解决吗?
@zx844174097 用你的方法测试后,不再频繁gc了,麻烦提个Pull Request吧,自己覆盖代码感觉还是不优雅
用Spring Boot的话，配置`spring.application.name`即可，默认dubbo会适配，以这个名字作为dubbo应用名
